title: Element Inspector
description:
Web browsers let you peek behind the scenes of any webpage! This challenge places a special badge on the page. Inspect it to reveal the hidden code.

STEPS:
1. Look near the top of this page for the glowing "Inspect Badge"
2. Right-click the badge and choose "Inspect" (or use Ctrl+Shift+I / Cmd+Option+I)
3. In the Elements panel, find the badge element
4. Check its data-flag attribute â€“ that's your answer!

NOTE: The badge shows up visually, but the flag only lives inside its HTML attributes.
hints: Use the element picker tool in DevTools to highlight the badge
Copy the text between the quotes after data-flag=
